SickToolbox::SickLMS::sick_lms_restart_status_tag Struct Reference

A structure for aggregating the data that collectively defines the system restart config for the Sick LMS 2xx unit. More...

Detailed Description

A structure for aggregating the data that collectively defines the system restart config for the Sick LMS 2xx unit.
